Package pkgMain

Class Screen

java.lang.Object
pkgMain.Screen
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddPlantListScreen, EditorScreen, GenInfoScreen, LepListScreen, LoadGardenScreen, MainScreen, PlantListScreen, PlantMoreInfoScreen, StartScreen
public abstract class Screen
extends java.lang.Object
The abstract class Screen defines values that all screens need to have and methods
Author:
alexsyou

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Screen​(View view)
    The screen constructor sets the view, as well as initializes the height and width of the screen to the height and width from the view
